data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Churachandpur, Manipur, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Churachandpur, Manipur, India

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 63,399, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Churachandpur, Manipur, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Churachandpur to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Churachandpur.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Churachandpur to exponentially multiply disciples.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Churachandpur, Manipur, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Churachandpur, Manipur, India has a population of 64,900.

We estimate Churachandpur has 714 people who might know Jesus, 787 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 63,399 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Churachandpur, Manipur, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
